shipping.title: Shipping & Payment
shipping.metaDescription: Shipping policy and accepted payment methods for HuppeR Auto Parts.
shipping.smallPartsBody: Small parts such as sensors, switches, trim pieces, emblems, mirrors, headlights, taillights, electrical components, and other compact items can be shipped via USPS or UPS. Shipping cost is additional and will be quoted based on part size, weight, and destination. Contact us before purchasing to confirm shipping availability and cost for your item.
shipping.largePartsTitle: Large & Heavy Parts — Local Pickup Only
shipping.largePartsBody: Large or heavy items such as doors, hoods, fenders, bumpers, engines, transmissions, axles, and body panels are not available for shipping. These items are available for local pickup only.
shipping.shippingArranged: Shipping is arranged separately. Please contact us via phone or email before placing an order if you need shipping. We will confirm availability, provide a shipping quote, and arrange payment accordingly.
shipping.noLiability: We are not responsible for shipping damage once the item has been handed to the carrier. Insurance is available upon request for an additional fee.
shipping.paymentTerms: Payment is due at the time of pickup or prior to shipping. For shipped orders, payment must be received and cleared before the item is sent. We do not accept credit cards, PayPal, or checks.
shipping.questionsBody: Contact us at <link>hupper.motors@gmail.com</link> for shipping quotes, payment questions, or to arrange a pickup. We typically respond within a few hours during business hours.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.metaDescription: Privacy Policy for HuppeR Auto Parts.
privacy.s1body: HuppeR Auto Parts ("we," "us," or "our") operates this website as an online catalog of used and refurbished automotive parts. This site does not process payments, does not require user registration, and does not use cookies. To purchase a part, buyers contact us directly via email or phone.
privacy.s2intro: We collect the following data to understand how the site is used and to improve our services:
privacy.s2pageViews: Page views: Which pages are visited and when.
privacy.s2ip: IP address: Your IP address is stored for analytics and security purposes.
privacy.s2device: Device & browser info: Device type (mobile/desktop), browser name, and operating system — extracted from the User-Agent header.
privacy.s2location: Location: Country determined from your IP address.
privacy.s2referrer: Referrer: The website that directed you here (if any).
privacy.s2visitor: Visitor identifier: A random anonymous ID stored in a cookie to distinguish unique visitors (see Section 3 below).
privacy.s2notCollect: We do NOT collect: names, email addresses, phone numbers, payment information, or any other personally identifiable information through this website.
privacy.s3intro: This website uses one cookie for analytics purposes:
privacy.s3cookieDesc: Anonymous visitor identifier — a random ID used to count unique visitors. Contains no personal information.
privacy.s3noThirdParty: We do not use any third-party analytics services (such as Google Analytics). Our analytics are entirely self-hosted and privacy-focused.
privacy.s4body: Our parts may also be listed on third-party platforms such as eBay and Facebook Marketplace. Those platforms have their own privacy policies that govern any data collected through them. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of third-party sites.
privacy.s5body: The site is served over HTTPS. Analytics data is stored in a secure database with row-level security. IP addresses are stored for analytics and security purposes and are accessible only to the site administrator.
privacy.s6disclaimer: ALL PARTS ARE SOLD "AS IS" WITH NO WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED.
privacy.s6intro: All automotive parts sold by HuppeR Auto Parts are used, recycled, or refurbished unless explicitly stated otherwise. By purchasing any part, the buyer acknowledges and agrees:
privacy.s6asIs: Parts are sold as-is, where-is, with no warranty of merchantability or fitness for a particular purpose.
privacy.s6noReturns: No returns, no refunds, no exchanges unless otherwise agreed in writing at the time of sale.
privacy.s6buyerResponsibility: It is the buyer's sole responsibility to verify part compatibility with their vehicle and to ensure proper installation by a qualified mechanic.
privacy.s6noLiability: HuppeR Auto Parts is not liable for any damages, injuries, or losses resulting from the purchase, installation, or use of any part.
privacy.s7warning: IMPORTANT SAFETY NOTICE — AIRBAGS & SUPPLEMENTAL RESTRAINT SYSTEMS (SRS)
privacy.s7certified: All airbags and SRS components must be installed by a certified technician. Improper installation can result in serious injury or death.
privacy.s7noGuarantee: Used airbags are sold as-is. No guarantee of deployment is made.
privacy.s7buyerRisk: The buyer assumes all risk associated with the purchase and use of airbag/SRS components.
privacy.s7recall: It is the buyer's responsibility to verify recall status at <link>nhtsa.gov/recalls</link> before installation.
privacy.s7regulated: Sale and installation of used airbags is regulated under federal and state laws. Compliance is the buyer's responsibility.
privacy.s8body: To the fullest extent permitted by law, HuppeR Auto Parts, its owners, employees, and affiliates shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising from the purchase, installation, or use of any products. Our maximum liability shall not exceed the purchase price of the product in question.
privacy.s9body: This website is not intended for individuals under the age of 18.
privacy.s10body: We may update this policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page.
privacy.s11intro: Questions about this policy or our products:

footer.copyright: © {year} HuppeR Auto Parts. All rights reserved.
